news_header: Pope Francis missed the Angelus prayer due to pneumonia for the second consecutive week, but his condition has slightly improved.
news_original_title: Paavi yhä sairaalassa – jättää sunnuntain rukoushetken väliin
news_text: Pope Francis missed the weekly Angelus prayer on Sunday due to pneumonia, marking the second consecutive week he has been absent from the event in St. Peter's Square. Although his condition has reportedly improved slightly in recent days, his doctors warned that 'the danger is not yet over.' A Vatican statement indicated that the Pope had a good night's sleep before the announcement.
